game.name: ELDORANTE
game.shortDescription: Shipwrecked on an unfamiliar island with no money or goods to pay for a ride home... What's a merchant to do? Explore the Dungeon and make her way to the golden land of Eldorante, that's what!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Shipwrecked on an unfamiliar island with no money or goods to pay for a ride home... What's a merchant to do? Explore the Dungeon and make her way to the golden land of Eldorante, that's what!
